Name: More Clay
Description: If your magazine is full of clay bullets, gain +1 clay bullet damage

Name: Ice Fire Resonance
Description: Ice + Fire or Fire + Ice, dealing 2 times the total explosion damage

Name: Maverick
Description: If you have only one bullet of the same type in your magazine, gain +5 damage per bullet

Name: Clay Skills
Description: If you have a two-star clay bullet in your magazine, the clay bullet damage is +3, and if you have a three-star clay bullet, the clay bullet damage is +10
